analyzed: atha yoga anuśāsanam
tadā draṣṭuḥ svarūpe vasthānam
vṛtti sārūpyam itaratra
vṛttayaḥ pañcatayyaḥ kliṣṭa akliṣṭāḥ
pramāṇa viparyaya vikalpa nidrā smṛtayaḥ
pratyakṣa anumāna āgamāḥ pramāṇāni
viparyayaḥ mithyājñānam a tad rūpa pratiṣṭham
śabda jñāna anupātī vastu śūnyaḥ vikalpaḥ
anubhūta viṣaya asaṃpramoṣaḥ smṛtiḥ
abhyāsa vairāgyābhyām tad nirodhaḥ
tatra sthitau yatnaḥ bhyāsaḥ
sa tu dīrgha kāla nairantarya satkāra āsevitaḥ dṛḍha bhūmiḥ
dṛṣṭa ānuśravika viṣaya vitṛṣṇasya vaśīkāra saṃjñā vairāgyam
tat param puruṣa khyāteḥ guṇa vaitṛṣṇyam
vitarka vicāra ānanda asmitā rūpa anugamāt saṃprajñātaḥ
virāma pratyaya abhyāsa pūrvaḥ saṃskāra śeṣaḥ nyaḥ
bhava pratyayaḥ videha prakṛti layānām
śraddhā vīrya smṛti samādhi prajñā pūrvakaḥ itareṣām
tīvra saṃvegānām āsannaḥ
mṛdu madhya adhimātra tvāt viśeṣaḥ
īśvara praṇidhānāt vā
kleśa karma vipāka āśayaiḥ aparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣa viśeṣaḥ īśvaraḥ
tatra niratiśayam sarvajña bījam
pūrveṣām api guruḥ kālena anavacchedāt
tasya vācakaḥ praṇavaḥ
tad japaḥ tad artha bhāvanam
tatas pratyak cetanā adhigamaḥ u pi antarāya abhāvaḥ ca
vyādhiḥ styāna saṃśaya pramāda ālasya avirati bhrānti darśana a labdha bhūmika tva anavasthita tvāni citta vikṣepāḥ te ntarāyāḥ
duḥkha daurmanasya aṅgamejaya tva śvāsa praśvāsāḥ vikṣepa sahabhuvaḥ
tad pratiṣedha artham eka tattva abhyāsaḥ
maitrī karuṇā muditā upekṣāṇām sukha duḥkha puṇya apuṇya viṣayāṇām bhāvanātaḥ citta prasādanam
pracchardana vidhāraṇābhyām vā prāṇasya

original: viṣayavatī vā pravṛttir utpannā manasaḥ sthitinibandhanī // YS_1.35 //
analyzed: viṣayavatī vā pravṛttiḥ utpannā manasaḥ sthiti nibandhanī
viśokā vā jyotiṣmatī
vīta rāga viṣayam vā cittam
svapna nidrā jñāna ālambanam vā
yathā abhimata dhyānāt vā
paramāṇu parama mahā tva antaḥ sya vaśīkāraḥ

original: kṣīṇavṛtter abhijātasyeva maṇer grahītṛgrahaṇagrāhyeṣu tatsthatadañjanatā samāpattiḥ // YS_1.41 //
analyzed: kṣīṇa vṛtteḥ abhijātasya iva maṇeḥ grahītṛ grahaṇa grāhyeṣu tad stha tad añjana tā samāpattiḥ

original: tatra śabdārthajñānavikalpaiḥ saṃkīrṇā savitarkā samāpattiḥ // YS_1.42 //
analyzed: tatra śabda artha jñāna vikalpaiḥ saṃkīrṇā sa vitarkā samāpattiḥ
smṛti pariśuddhau sva rūpa śūnyā iva artha mātra nirbhāsā nirvitarkā

original: etayaiva savicārā nirvicārā ca sūkṣmaviṣayā vyākhyātā // YS_1.44 //
analyzed: etayā eva sa vicārā nirvicārā ca sūkṣma viṣayā vyākhyātā
sūkṣma viṣaya tvam ca aliṅga paryavasānam
tāḥ eva sa bījaḥ samādhiḥ
ṛtaṃbharā tatra prajñā
śruta anumāna prajñābhyām anya viṣayāḥ viśeṣa artha tvāt
tad jaḥ saṃskāraḥ nya saṃskāra pratibandhī

original: tasyāpi nirodhe sarvanirodhān nirbījaḥ samādhiḥ // YS_1.51 //
analyzed: tasya api nirodhe sarva nirodhāt nirbījaḥ samādhiḥ
tapaḥ svādhyāya īśvara praṇidhānāni kriyā yogaḥ
samādhi bhāvanā arthaḥ kleśa tanūkaraṇa arthaḥ ca
avidyā asmitā rāga dveṣa abhiniveśāḥ kleśāḥ
avidyā kṣetram uttareṣām prasupta tanu vicchinna udārāṇām
anitya aśuci duḥkha anātmasu nitya śuci sukha ātma khyātiḥ avidyā
dṛś darśana śaktyoḥ eka ātma tā iva asmitā
sukha anuśayī rāgaḥ
duḥkha anuśayī dveṣaḥ
sva rasa vāhī tathā rūḍhaḥ bhiniveśaḥ
te pratiprasava heyāḥ sūkṣmāḥ
dhyāna heyāḥ tad vṛttayaḥ
kleśa mūlaḥ karma āśayaḥ dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa janma vedanīyaḥ
sati mūle tad vipākaḥ jāti āyuḥ bhogāḥ
te hlāda paritāpa phalāḥ puṇya apuṇya hetu tvāt

original: pariṇāmatāpasaṃskāraduḥkhair guṇavṛttivirodhāc ca duḥkham eva sarvaṃ vivekinaḥ // YS_2.15 //
analyzed: pariṇāma tāpa saṃskāra duḥkhaiḥ guṇa vṛtti virodhāt ca duḥkham eva sarvam vivekinaḥ
heyam duḥkham anāgatam
draṣṭṛ dṛśyayoḥ saṃyogaḥ heya hetuḥ
prakāśa kriyā sthiti śīlam bhūta indriya ātmakam bhoga apavarga artham dṛśyam
viśeṣa aviśeṣa liṅga mātra aliṅgāni guṇa parvāṇi
draṣṭā dṛśi mātraḥ śuddhaḥ pi pratyaya anupaśyaḥ
tad arthaḥ eva dṛśyasya ātmā

original: kṛtārthaṃ prati naṣṭam apy anaṣṭaṃ tadanyasādhāraṇatvāt // YS_2.22 //
analyzed: kṛtārtham prati naṣṭam api anaṣṭam tad anya sādhāraṇa tvāt
sva svāmi śaktyoḥ sva rūpa upalabdhi hetuḥ saṃyogaḥ
tasya hetuḥ avidyā

original: tadabhāvāt saṃyogābhāvo hānaṃ taddṛśeḥ kaivalyam // YS_2.25 //
analyzed: tad abhāvāt saṃyoga abhāvaḥ hānam tad dṛśeḥ kaivalyam
viveka khyātiḥ aviplavā hāna upāyaḥ
tasya saptadhā prānta bhūmiḥ prajñā

original: yogāṅgānuṣṭhānād aśuddhikṣaye jñānadīptir ā vivekakhyāteḥ // YS_2.28 //
analyzed: yogāṅga anuṣṭhānāt aśuddhi kṣaye jñāna dīptiḥ viveka khyāteḥ
yama niyama āsana prāṇāyāma pratyāhāra dhāraṇā dhyāna samādhayaḥ ṣṭāv aṅgāni
ahiṃsā satya asteya brahmacarya aparigrahāḥ yamāḥ
jāti deśa kāla samaya anavacchinnāḥ sārvabhaumāḥ mahāvratam
śauca saṃtoṣa tapaḥ svādhyāya īśvara praṇidhānāni niyamāḥ
vitarka bādhane pratipakṣa bhāvanam

original: vitarkā hiṃsādayaḥ kṛtakāritānumoditā lobhakrodhamohapūrvakā mṛdumadhyādhimātrā duḥkhājñānānantaphalā iti pratipakṣabhāvanam // YS_2.34 //
analyzed: vitarkāḥ hiṃsā ādayaḥ kṛta kārita anumoditāḥ lobha krodha moha pūrvakāḥ mṛdu madhya adhimātrāḥ duḥkha ajñāna ananta phalāḥ iti pratipakṣa bhāvanam
ahiṃsā pratiṣṭhāyām tad saṃnidhau vaira tyāgaḥ
satya pratiṣṭhāyām kriyā phala āśraya tvam
asteya pratiṣṭhāyām sarva ratna upasthānam
brahmacarya pratiṣṭhāyām vīrya lābhaḥ
a parigraha sthairye janma kathaṃtā saṃbodhaḥ
śaucāt sva aṅga jugupsā paraiḥ a saṃsargaḥ
sattva śuddhi saumanasya aikāgrya indriya jaya ātma darśana yogya tvāni ca
saṃtoṣāt anuttamaḥ sukha lābhaḥ
kāya indriya siddhiḥ aśuddhi kṣayāt tapasaḥ
svādhyāyāt iṣṭadevatā saṃprayogaḥ
sthira sukham āsanam
prayatna śaithilya ananta samāpattibhyām
tatas dvandva anabhighātaḥ

original: tasmin sati śvāsapraśvāsayor gativicchedaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ // YS_2.49 //
analyzed: tasmin sati śvāsa praśvāsayoḥ gati vicchedaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ
bāhya ābhyantara stambha vṛttiḥ deśa kāla saṃkhyābhiḥ paridṛṣṭaḥ dīrgha sūkṣmaḥ
tatas kṣīyate prakāśa āvaraṇam
dhāraṇāsu ca yogya tā manasaḥ
sva viṣaya asaṃprayoge citta sva rūpa anukāraḥ iva indriyāṇām pratyāhāraḥ
tatas paramā vaśya tā indriyāṇām
deśa bandhaḥ cittasya dhāraṇā
tatra pratyaya eka tāna tā dhyānam

original: tad evārthamātranirbhāsaṃ svarūpaśūnyam iva samādhiḥ // YS_3.3 //
analyzed: tat eva artha mātra nirbhāsam sva rūpa śūnyam iva samādhiḥ
trayam ekatra saṃyamaḥ
tad jayāt prajñā ālokaḥ
tasya bhūmiṣu viniyogaḥ
trayam antaraṅgam pūrvebhyaḥ
tat api bahiraṅgam nirbījasya
vyutthāna nirodha saṃskārayoḥ abhibhava prādurbhāvau nirodha kṣaṇa citta anvayaḥ nirodha pariṇāmaḥ
tasya praśānta vāhitā saṃskārāt

original: tataḥ punaḥ śāntoditau tulyapratyayau cittasyaikāgratāpariṇāmaḥ // YS_3.12 //
analyzed: tatas punar śānta uditau tulya pratyayau cittasya ekāgra tā pariṇāmaḥ
etena bhūta indriyeṣu dharma lakṣaṇa avasthā pariṇāmāḥ vyākhyātāḥ

original: śabdārthapratyayānām itaretarādhyāsāt saṃkaras tatpravibhāgasaṃyamāt sarvabhūtarutajñānam // YS_3.17 //
analyzed: śabda artha pratyayānām itaretara adhyāsāt saṃkaraḥ tad pravibhāga saṃyamāt sarva bhūta ruta jñānam
saṃskāra sākṣātkaraṇāt pūrva jāti jñānam

original: na ca tat sālambanaṃ tasyāviṣayībhūtatvāt // YS_3.20 //
analyzed: na ca tat sālambanam tasya a viṣayībhūta tvāt
kāya rūpa saṃyamāt tad grāhya śakti stambhe cakṣuḥ prakāśa a saṃprayoge ntardhānam

original: sopakramaṃ nirupakramaṃ ca karma tatsaṃyamād aparāntajñānam ariṣṭebhyo vā // YS_3.22 //
analyzed: sa upakramam nirupakramam ca karma tad saṃyamāt aparāntajñānam ariṣṭebhyaḥ vā
maitrī ādiṣu balāni
baleṣu hasti bala ādīni
dhruve tad gati jñānam
kūrmanāḍyām sthairyam
prātibhāt vā sarvam
hṛdaye citta saṃvid

original: sattvapuruṣayor atyantāsaṃkīrṇayoḥ pratyayāviśeṣo bhogaḥ parārthāt svārthasaṃyamāt puruṣajñānam // YS_3.35 //
analyzed: sattva puruṣayoḥ atyanta asaṃkīrṇayoḥ pratyaya aviśeṣaḥ bhogaḥ para arthāt sva artha saṃyamāt puruṣa jñānam
tatas prātibha śrāvaṇa vedana ādarśa āsvāda vārtāḥ jāyante

original: te samādhāv upasargā vyutthāne siddhayaḥ // YS_3.37 //
analyzed: te samādhau upasargāḥ vyutthāne siddhayaḥ

original: bandhakāraṇaśaithilyāt pracārasaṃvedanāc ca cittasya paraśarīrāveśaḥ // YS_3.38 //
analyzed: bandha kāraṇa śaithilyāt pracāra saṃvedanāt ca cittasya para śarīra āveśaḥ

original: udānajayāj jalapaṅkakaṇṭakādiṣv asaṅga utkrāntiś ca // YS_3.39 //
analyzed: udāna jayāt jala paṅka kaṇṭaka ādiṣu asaṅgaḥ utkrāntiḥ ca
samāna jayāt jvalanam
śrotra ākāśayoḥ saṃbandha saṃyamāt divyam śrotram
kāya ākāśayoḥ saṃbandha saṃyamāt laghu tūla samāpatteḥ ca ākāśagamanam

original: bahir akalpitā vṛttir mahāvidehā tataḥ prakāśāvaraṇakṣayaḥ // YS_3.43 //
analyzed: bahis akalpitā vṛttiḥ mahāvidehā tatas prakāśa āvaraṇa kṣayaḥ
tatas ṇima ādi prādurbhāvaḥ kāya saṃpad tad dharma anabhighātaḥ ca
rūpa lāvaṇya bala vajra saṃhanana tvāni kāya saṃpad

original: tato manojavitvaṃ vikaraṇabhāvaḥ pradhānajayaś ca // YS_3.48 //
analyzed: tatas manojavi tvam vikaraṇa bhāvaḥ pradhāna jayaḥ ca
sattva puruṣa anya tā khyāti mātrasya sarva bhāva adhiṣṭhātṛ tvam sarvajñātṛ tvam ca
tad vairāgyāt api doṣa bīja kṣaye kaivalyam
sthāni upanimantraṇe saṅga smayā akaraṇam punar aniṣṭa prasaṅgāt

original: jātilakṣaṇadeśair anyatānavacchedāt tulyayos tataḥ pratipattiḥ // YS_3.53 //
analyzed: jāti lakṣaṇa deśaiḥ anyatā anavacchedāt tulyayoḥ tatas pratipattiḥ

original: tārakaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ sarvathāviṣayam akramaṃ ceti vivekajaṃ jñānam // YS_3.54 //
analyzed: tārakam sarva viṣayam sarvathāviṣayam akramam ca iti viveka jam jñānam
sattva puruṣayoḥ śuddhi sāmye kaivalyam iti
janma auṣadhi mantra tapaḥ samādhi jāḥ siddhayaḥ
jāti antara pariṇāmaḥ prakṛti āpūrāt

original: nimittam aprayojakaṃ prakṛtīnāṃ varaṇabhedas tu tataḥ kṣetrikavat // YS_4.3 //
analyzed: nimittam aprayojakam prakṛtīnām varaṇa bhedaḥ tu tatas kṣetrika vat
nirmāṇa cittāni asmitā mātrāt

original: pravṛttibhede prayojakaṃ cittam ekam anekeṣām // YS_4.5 //
analyzed: pravṛtti bhede prayojakam cittam ekam anekeṣām
tatra dhyāna jam anāśayam
karma a śukla a kṛṣṇam yoginaḥ trividham itareṣām
tatas tad vipāka anuguṇānām evā abhivyaktiḥ vāsanānām

original: jātideśakālavyavahitānām apy ānantaryaṃ smṛtisaṃskārayor ekarūpatvāt // YS_4.9 //
analyzed: jāti deśa kāla vyavahitānām api ānantaryam smṛti saṃskārayoḥ eka rūpa tvāt
tāsām anādi tvam ca āśiṣaḥ nitya tvāt

original: hetuphalāśrayālambanaiḥ saṃgṛhītatvād eṣām abhāve tadabhāvaḥ // YS_4.11 //
analyzed: hetu phala āśraya ālambanaiḥ saṃgṛhīta tvāt eṣām abhāve tad abhāvaḥ
atīta anāgatam svarūpataḥ sti adhva bhedāt dharmāṇām
te vyakta sūkṣmāḥ guṇa ātmānaḥ

original: vastusāmye cittabhedāt tayor vibhaktaḥ panthāḥ // YS_4.15 //
analyzed: vastu sāmye citta bhedāt tayoḥ vibhaktaḥ panthāḥ

original: na caikacittatantraṃ vastu tadapramāṇakaṃ tadā kiṃ syāt // YS_4.16 //
analyzed: na ca eka citta tantram vastu tat apramāṇakam tadā kim syāt
tad uparāga apekṣi tvāt cittasya vastu jñāta ajñātam

original: sadā jñātāś cittavṛttayas tatprabhoḥ puruṣasyāpariṇāmitvāt // YS_4.18 //
analyzed: sadā jñātāḥ citta vṛttayaḥ tad prabhoḥ puruṣasya apariṇāmi tvāt
na tat su ābhāsam dṛśya tvāt
eka samaye ca ubhaya anavadhāraṇam

original: cittāntaradṛśye buddhibuddher atiprasaṅgaḥ smṛtisaṃkaraś ca // YS_4.21 //
analyzed: citta antara dṛśye buddhi buddheḥ atiprasaṅgaḥ smṛti saṃkaraḥ ca
citeḥ apratisaṃkramāyāḥ tad ākāra āpattau sva buddhi saṃvedanam
draṣṭṛ dṛśya uparaktam cittam sarva artham

original: tad asaṃkhyeyavāsanābhiś citram api parārthaṃ saṃhatyakāritvāt // YS_4.24 //
analyzed: tat asaṃkhyeya vāsanābhiḥ citram api para artham saṃhatya kāri tvāt
tadā viveka nimnam kaivalya prāgbhāram cittam
tad chidreṣu pratyaya antarāṇi saṃskārebhyaḥ
hānam eṣām kleśa vat uktam

original: prasaṃkhyāne 'py akusīdasya sarvathā vivekakhyāter dharmameghaḥ samādhiḥ // YS_4.29 //
analyzed: prasaṃkhyāne pi akusīdasya sarvathā viveka khyāteḥ dharmameghaḥ samādhiḥ

original: tadā sarvāvaraṇamalāpetasya jñānasyānantyāj jñeyam alpam // YS_4.31 //
analyzed: tadā sarva āvaraṇa mala apetasya jñānasya ānantyāt jñeyam alpam
tatas kṛtārthānām pariṇāma krama samāptiḥ guṇānām

original: puruṣārthaśūnyānāṃ guṇānāṃ pratiprasavaḥ kaivalyaṃ svarūpapratiṣṭhā vā citiśaktir iti // YS_4.34 //
analyzed: puruṣa artha śūnyānām guṇānām pratiprasavaḥ kaivalyam svarūpa pratiṣṭhā vā citi śaktiḥ iti
